name: Welcome to HTML MASTERY with Skill Hero.
details: Learn HTML effeciently. In this course you will learn the topic from basic to advance. After finishing the course completely you will be master in this field
more_details_body: This course aims to teach everyone the basics of programming computers using HTML. We cover the basics of how one constructs a program from a series of simple instructions in HTML.  The course has no pre-requisites and avoids all but the simplest mathematics. Anyone with moderate computer experience should be able to master the materials in this course. This course will cover Chapters 1-5 of the textbook “HTML for Everybody”.  Once a student completes this course, they will be ready to take more advanced programming courses.
